alert.note: Alert for Cass; Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Fulton; Marshall; Miami; Northern Kosciusko; Northern La Porte; Pulaski; Southern Kosciusko; Southern La Porte; Starke; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 21 at 11:10AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT THURSDAY NIGHT... Air Quality Action Days have been declared by the Indiana Department of Environmental Management. An Air Quality Action Day is in effect today and tonight for most of northwest Indiana and all of northeast Indiana. The Air Quality Action Day has been extended into Thursday and Thursday evening for the following counties in Indiana: Cass, Miami, Fulton, Pulaski, Starke, Marshall, Kosciusko, Elkhart, St. Joseph, and La Porte. Ozone levels are expected to be in the Orange or unhealthy for sensitive groups range. People and businesses are urged to avoid activities which lead to ozone and fine particulate formation. These activities include... refueling vehicles or topping off when refueling, using gasoline powered lawn equipment and using charcoal lighter fluid. Positive activities include...car pooling, biking to work, delaying or combining errands and using water based paints. It is recommended that people with respiratory diseases such as asthma limit prolonged outdoor exertion. && For additional information, please visit the IDEM SMOG Watch web site at https://apps.idem.in.gov/smogwatch/ or the EPA AIRNOW web site at www.airnow.gov and click on Indiana.
